root.name: Kabuki Ittou Ryoudan
root.description: OverviewKabuki Ittou Ryoudan is a 2D VS. Fighter that was developed by A.I and Red Company and originally released for the PC Engine CD in 1995. In 2008, it was ported to the PSP as part of the Tengai Makyou Collection.The majority of the fighting roster includes characters from Tengai Makyou II: Manjimaru and Tengai Makyou: Fuun Kabuki Den.
